build.buildCommand: cd taskjuggler-api && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && composer dump-autoload --optimize && cd ../taskjuggler-web && npm ci && VITE_API_URL=https://taskjuggler-production.up.railway.app/api npm run build && cd ../taskjuggler-api && cp -r ../taskjuggler-web/dist/* public/ && chmod -R 775 storage bootstrap/cache && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache
